headline: Pool Corp Q3 Earnings & Revenues Surpass Estimates, Stock Up
summary: POOL's performance in the third quarter of 2024 benefits from steady demand in the maintenance segment, while the more discretionary areas continued to face challenges.

headline: Boyd Gaming's Q3 Earnings & Revenues Beat Estimates, Stock Up
summary: BYD's third-quarter 2024 results reflect benefits from investments in the Downtown Las Vegas and Midwest & South segments.
